statements: UPDATE music_recommendations SET song = 'Hello' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE music_recommendations SET genre = 'Rock', artist = 'Queen' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE music_recommendations SET genre = 'Rock', artist = 'Foo Fighters', song = 'Everlong' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE music_recommendations SET song = 'Bohemian Rhapsody', genre = 'Rock', artist = 'Queen' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET username = 'Alice', preferred_genres = ARRAY['Pop', 'Hip Hop'] WHERE user_id = 'f47ee84b-78ac-4ad0-a7a2-4e8b0d59e7e0';
UPDATE music_recommendations SET recommendation = 'Top Hits', recommendation_score = 9.5 WHERE user_id = 'f47ee84b-78ac-4ad0-a7a2-4e8b0d59e7e0';
UPDATE users SET preferred_genres = ARRAY['Pop', 'Hip Hop'] WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE music_recommendations SET recommendation = 'New Album Release' , recommendation_score = 9.5 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND recommendation_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Genres SET genre_name = 'Jazz' WHERE genre_id = 3;
UPDATE Users SET email = 'test@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE ListeningHistory SET listen_date = '2021-10-15', track_id = 3 WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE songs SET genre_id = 2, song_name = 'New Song Name' WHERE song_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET email='new.email@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE songs SET genre_id=2, song_name='Updated Song Name' WHERE song_id=3;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '12345678-abcd-9876-ef01-234567890abc';

UPDATE songs SET genre_id = '87654321-dcba-6789-10fe-abcdef012345', song_name = 'Updated Song Name' WHERE genre_id = '12345678-abcd-9876-ef01-234567890abc' AND song_id = '98765432-dcba-0123-4567-89ab-cdef01234567';
